content.rendered:
• IG Account Outreach – 1000+ Follow-ups + 5 Backup pages (500+ follow-ups)
  • LinkedIn/Email/5 Additional Outreach (TikTok, X, Facebook, or more emails/LinkedIn profiles) (350+ FOLLOW UPS EACH PLATFORM) – Daily outbound messages/connections
  • Email & SMS Marketing
  • Highest Level SEO + additional backlinking & reputation support or Highest Level Ad Management on 4 platforms (+ FULL AD CREATION)
  • Website or DFY Community Build out + landing page
  • Press Release (7 Articles, 7 TV, and 7 Podcast Placements)
  • Business Audit: Rev Scaling, CRO, Going Viral, Team Building, Technology, Offer Building, and Management Consulting (7 (1 HOUR 15 MIN CALL)
  • CRM Build Out / Management
  • 120 Video Edits + 65 Graphic Designs (individual graphics or carousels)
  • Social posting + caption management on 5 Instagram pages + all other social profiles
  • Full Video Training (200+ Videos)
  • Private Community Group

Continued on a 4 month basis or custom plan generated (follow-up call in 4 months).
